title: Chinna Thaai Aval Song Lyrics Thalapathi
stanzas:
Chinna thaai aval
Thandha raasaave
Mullil thondriya
Chinna rosaave.(2)

Sollavaa aaraarao
Nam sondhangal
Yaar yaaro
Undhan kannil
Yaenthaan neero.

Chinna thaai aval
Thandha raasaave
Mullil thondriya
Chinna rosaave.

Thaai azhuthaale nee vara
Nee azhuthaale thaai vara
Thaeipirai naanum vennilaa
Thaeivadhu undo ennillaaa

Unnai Naan indha
Nenjil vaangida
Meththai pol unnai
Mella thaangida
Vizhi moodaatho..

Chinna thaai aval
Thandha raasaave
Mullil thondriya
Chinna rosaave.(2)
